FuncDef:
The user volume-quota apply command applies a user traffic volume quota to upstream or downstream traffic.
The undo user volume-quota apply command restores the default configuration.
By default, the user traffic volume quota applies to both upstream and downstream traffic.
CLIs: undo user volume-quota apply [ inbound | outbound ]

ParaDef.Info:
Applies the user traffic volume quota to upstream traffic.
-

Applies the user traffic volume quota to downstream traffic.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
While providing prepaid services, carriers can perform accounting based on the upstream traffic, downstream traffic, or both the upstream and downstream traffic. To apply a user traffic volume quota to upstream or downstream traffic, run the user volume-quota apply command.
Configuration Impact
After the user volume-quota apply command is run, the user traffic volume quota decreases with the specified upstream or downstream traffic volume.
If the user volume-quota apply command is run more than once, the latest configuration overrides the previous one.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
